section.p: The militiamen are down. The tall gentleman watches you like a snake with its eyes on a mongoose. You have no time to bother with him now.
‘We’ll meet again, perhaps,’ he says in a voice like slithering murder. Remember my name: Talanexor the Fireweaver.’
‘Remember my name,’ you call back as you lope off, ‘Lauria the Housebreaker.’
Let the conniving vixen get into trouble. She nearly played you for her patsy, after all. .
